quote: Everything I am longing for - peace of mind, contentment, grace, the inner awareness of my abundance - will surely be mine... when I am prepared to receive ALL with an open and Thankful heart.
quote_letters: EVERYTHING I AM LONGING FOR - PEACE OF MIND CONTENTMENT GRACE THE INNER AWARENESS OF MY ABUNDANCE - WILL SURELY BE MINE WHEN I AM PREPARED TO RECEIVE ALL WITH AN OPEN AND THANKFUL HEART
